name: Microneedling Body After Care 100ml 6pcs
description: The specially selected formula provides extra energy to the body skin cells, neutralizing the harmful free radicals that are one of the major causes of skin aging and sagging body skin. Acts like an energy boost to the skin, providing its much needed elasticity to repair faster and remain a healthy look. Intended for the body skin parts that need extra boost to firm, tone and repair, in order to achieve slightly better skin appearance.
